SupportedPlatform.name: All x86 NT
SupportedPlatform.Expression: SELECT * FROM Win32_OperatingSystem WHERE OSType=18
SELECT * FROM Win32_Processor WHERE Architecture=0

SupportedPlatform.name: All x86 Windows XP
SupportedPlatform.Expression: SELECT * FROM Win32_OperatingSystem WHERE BuildNumber = '2600' AND OSType=18
SELECT * FROM Win32_Processor WHERE Architecture=0

SupportedPlatform.Expression: SELECT * FROM Win32_OperatingSystem WHERE BuildNumber = '2600' AND OSType=18 AND ServicePackMajorVersion = 0
SELECT * FROM Win32_Processor WHERE Architecture=0

SupportedPlatform.Expression: SELECT * FROM Win32_OperatingSystem WHERE BuildNumber = '2600' AND OSType=18 AND ServicePackMajorVersion = 1
SELECT * FROM Win32_Processor WHERE Architecture=0

SELECT * FROM Win32_Processor WHERE Architecture=0

SELECT * FROM Win32_OperatingSystem WHERE OtherTypeDescription = NULL
